definition: to set to one side and ignore (idiom); quite indifferent/cold and uncaring

sentences.english: Murray appeared impassive as a court officer read the verdict.
sentences.chinese: 审判员当庭宣读了判决书，默里表情漠然。

sentences.english: Their response to the proposal was, at best, cool.
sentences.chinese: 他们对提议的反应充其量只能说是漠然置之。

sentences.english: Do not take for granted the thins closest to your heart.
sentences.chinese: 不要对内心深处的东西漠然视之。

sentences.english: His opinions cannot be brushed aside.
sentences.chinese: 他的意见不能漠然视之。

sentences.english: The harmfulness of educational corruption has historical corrosion, towards which we can not re-main indifferent.
sentences.chinese: 教育腐败的危害性具有历史腐蚀性，决不可漠然处之。

sentences.english: Mme Roland is indifferent to posterity.
sentences.chinese: 罗兰夫人于是对后代的问题也冷淡漠然。

sentences.english: My grandfather nonchalantly pounded nails into posts and hung various things on them.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父漠然地袭击钉成员额和洪各种事情上。

sentences.english: He is indifferent to fame and gain, and never cares about them.
sentences.chinese: 对于世俗名利，他总是漠然置之，不放在心上。

sentences.english: But the indifference is really the antithesis of love.
sentences.chinese: 而漠然的男人，才真真正正到达了爱的相反方向。

sentences.english: He existed with her, entirely indifferent to the general values of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他和她生活在一起，对世界的一般价值漠然处之。

sentences.english: Don't turn a blind eye to matters that concern the people's welfare.
sentences.chinese: 不要对民众的利益漠然置之。

sentences.english: A quick moment lapsed before Rukawa managed to recover his impassive expression.
sentences.chinese: 流川花了一小会儿功夫才恢复他漠然的神情。

sentences.english: Concerning those who are near and dear, we prefer anger to indifference.
sentences.chinese: 对于那些亲近和亲爱的人，我们喜欢愤怒胜于漠然。

sentences.english: The officials were holding loose and not in earnest.
sentences.chinese: 官员们都漠然置之，并不认真对待。

sentences.english: Pictures of hunger usually show passive eyes and swollen bellies.
sentences.chinese: 通常我们看到的饥民都是眼神漠然，腹部肿胀。

sentences.english: If we do look away, how many others will die?
sentences.chinese: 如果我们漠然置之，还有多少人会死去？

definition: cold and detached towards sb/lack of regard/indifference/neglect
